segments.text: My employer cut back on my hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you got laid off or are working a lot fewer hours , you may qualify .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I definitely get to collect unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not all jobs pay into unemployment insurance , so their employees cannot collect benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I check out my status to collect unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should have noticed unemployment insurance being deducted from your paycheck . Check your pay stubs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much will my unemployment check be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The more money you made , the more you will earn on unemployment . They have a formula .
segments.speaker: S2
